title: Josh Thewlis (rugby league)
text:
Josh Thewlis is an English <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a or er for the <a href="Warrington%20Wolves">Warrington Wolves</a> in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a>.
Background.
Thewlis was born in <a href="Oldham">Oldham</a>, <a href="Greater%20Manchester">Greater Manchester</a>, England.
Played amateur rugby league for Waterhead Warriors
Career.
Thewlis made his Super League debut for Warrington in their 34-4 victory over the <a href="Catalans%20Dragons">Catalans Dragons</a> in round 17 of the <a href="Super%20League%20XXIV">2019 Super League season</a>.
